function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lower proportion of tests performed among 0-4 year olds","Impact":"Underreporting of positive cases in young children","Mitigation":"Increase testing rates for young children to accurately assess positivity rates","Technologies":"Testing facilities, mobile testing units","People":"0-4 year olds, parents, caregivers","Owner":"Health authorities, policymakers, testing facilities"},{"Description":"Lower positive rate for 0-4 year olds compared to overall positive rate","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the role of young children in COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure rigorous and ongoing data collection and analysis for young children","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, surveillance systems","People":"Researchers, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Tendency in the current body of research to suggest that schools and daycare centers are not seen as drivers of COVID-19 caseloads","Impact":"Misguided policies and decisions regarding school and daycare center closures","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive and localized studies on the role of schools and daycare centers in disease transmission","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, contact tracing tools","People":"Education authorities, policymakers, parents","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
